author: Fox News
title: Hacking collective Anonymous appears to declare war on Putin after Russia invades Ukraine
description: Anonymous, an international hacking collective that has conducted cyberattacks against governments and corporations, appeared to declare war against Putin and Russia due to its invasion of Ukraine.
content: Anonymous, an international hacking collective that has conducted cyberattacks against governments and corporations, appeared to declare war against Putin and Russia due to its invasion of Ukraine. … [+2387 chars]
